entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -25.3°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Ice fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
